inn1.comm: begins with a good length slanted too far across the left-hander
swings in a bit and comes in to the pad from a good length, is tucked down to fine leg
pitched full outside off stump now, he reaches out to defend off a thick inside edge
good length ball moves away from the right-hander outside off stump, left alone

early wicket for Philander and South Africa, it is Shehzad, centurion from the previous game, who falls to an outswinger, no need to play at it, it was pitched up quite some way outside off, Shehzad pushed for a weak drive, and edged at a comfortable height to first slip
almost another one, Philander angles this in very close to off, Shafiq is lured into a push, and the ball swings away late just past the edge
pitches slightly wider outside off and Shafiq immediately lets it go, excellent carry through to the keeper
sharp lift from just back of a length outside off, left alone
bowls it fuller outside off, it straightens late, left alone once more
towards the stumps this time, defended off a thick inside edge to square leg
rides the bounce on this short of a length ball, gets on his toes and punches to point
stays around the crease and defends the straightening good length ball tightly to the off side
nicely bowled, pitched up for the drive, and swings away late to the keeper as batsman flags it through
an uncertain push forward as this length ball moves in after pitching, scoots off a thick inside edge behind square leg
sharp bouncer now, Amin swerves away quite safely as the ball whizzes past his left shoulder
pushed off the front foot to mid off
good length ball pushed to cover
goes after this full delivery now, big stride forward and smashes it to the deep cover rope

loud sound as the ball passes bat on the forward push and Shafiq has to walk back, normal left-arm seamer's line from Tsotsobe, angled across the right-hander close to off stump, generating some extra bounce, Shafiq unable to get behind the line and feathers it through to the keeper
that was close as well, this one straightened on Maqsood, who tried to flick and survived with an inside edge to pad
pushes forward at this length ball and it runs to the fielder at third man
that flew, that really took off way over the batsman as Tsotsobe banged it in short, keeper had to jump high to take it
another one rearing high as Tsotsobe angles a bouncer across
back of a length now, defended to the off side
takes a couple of steps out now and eases this pitched up ball to mid off
a touch late in stepping half forward to this length ball on off, defends safely in the end
pitched up and straightening but down the leg side
moves across, gets behind the line of this good length ball and blocks solidly
fine shot, there was width on the length ball, and Amin punched with power and timing, but it flew straight to cover
flicked in the air off the pad, de Kock dives but it is too quick for him, Philander getting the line wrong again
good comeback, beats the left-hander, who prods away from the body at one bouncing and leaving him outside off

whoa, how's that for a batsman's comeback now, this wasn;t too short from Philander, but didn't get up too much as well, Amin burst into a quick, instinctive pull, sending the ball soaring over the deep square leg boundary
length ball left with the angle outside off
loose again from a Pakistan batsman, Maqsood pushes half forward at one slanted across and is beaten
Tsotsobe digs in the bouncer too short, and for the second time it rises too much, this time the keeper's leap is in vain
comes forward now to a pitched up delivery to push to cover
steps forward and defends to cover
Maqsood splits the gap between cover and point with a step out, a forward stride and a confident drive
well left, a good length ball close to off but Maqsood is dead sure he has nothing to do with this
gets behind the line of a good length ball on off and blocks solidly
banged in short, Amin weaves inside the line and lets it zoom past
pitches it up, slants it across, Amin takes a stride out and shoulders arms
shortish and not getting up much again, but Amin, on one leg, controls the swat very well, to deep square leg
walks out now, and plays out a length ball to the off side
pushed towards point
lifts and moves away slightly outside off, left alone
comes in with the angle to the pad, Amin tucks it to midwicket
comes forward to defend this straightening delivery tentatively to square leg
walks across off now in the crease and pulls bat away from the line of this length ball
Duminy's saved a boundary at backward point with a leap to his left, Amin had driven this hard into the ground and it was bouncing high past the fielder
pitched up delivery pushed in the air but falling well short of mid off
full, swinging away from off, he walks down the cover it, and drives it back to Philander
short of a length, just outside off, covers the line, and punches it to cover
short of a length again, angling in towards off, defended from the crease
slightly fuller but not a half-volley by any stretch. He stands tall, plays it on the up, and push-drives it between mid-off and extra cover. Top shot
pulls the length back, gets it to bounce towards the sticker on the bat. Defended off the back foot
short of a length again, outside off, pushed to mid-off. No seam movement for Philander in that over

Philander has over-run this one at third man. Tsotsobe is very unlucky with this ball. First Amin slashes hard at a widish delivery, gets a thick edge towards third man. Philander over-runs to his right, and is beaten to his left
length ball outside off, defended off the front foot
some movement away from the left-hand batsman. Left alone outside off
slightly short of a good length, defended by Amin outside off, but this hits him high on the bat
fuller, angling in, pushed to mid-on
short, not too wide, Amin stays back and stylishly cuts it past short cover for four
poor line first up. Short of a length, straying too far down the leg side. Maqsood tucks it away off the hip for a four fine of fine leg
gets the line right here. Short of a length, on off, rising towards the hip. Defended
short of a length again, Maqsood tries to get inside its line and work it to leg, but is beaten and is hit on the thigh pad
stays short of a length, Maqsood is slightly forward but adjusts well, rising with the bounce and defending it to cover
Maqsood is committed forward again, and has to stab at this rising towards his chest. Manages to keep it down, gets a single to third man

lovely catch. Superbly timed leap by Amla at the lone slip. Short of a length, middle and off, angling away, Amin wants to hit it, but the bounce gets too much for him. It seems the thick edge will fly over slip, but Amla leaps high in the air, both feet up, and pouches it
length ball, on off, holds its line, pushed to mid-off
on a length, just outside off, loose drive from Maqsood, gets an inside edge towards midwicket
leans into a length ball outside off and drives it nicely, but straight to cover
a half chance for a caught-and-bowled. Misbah drives but a little hard and back at Parnell who has to dive forward in his follow-through if he has to pull off an absolute stunner. He can't
short of a length, just outside off, defended from the crease
it's Tsotsobe who misfields this time two overs he saw Philander misfield off his bowling. Driven on the up, towards mid-off, but Tsotsobe dives over it, and concedes a single
this bounces outside off, but starts too far outside, easy leave
shortish again and wrong line again, this time down the leg side, helped along fine comfortably even as it rises around chest high
walks across now to this short of a length ball and nudges it square on the leg side
goes across and plays out this back of a length ball to the on side
Misbah moves across again and gets into trouble, this one moves in after pitching and he is hit high on the thigh pad after pushing outside the line, replays show it would have gone over
gets behind the line safely this time and blocks the length ball
opens the face to this full and wide one and runs it to third man
flies from back of a length across the right-hander, who lets it go
goes across and outside off, stays around the crease and keeps this lifter down off the splice
big forward stride and firm push, man at mid off is a touch slow, the single was on anway
turned to midwicket for a single
that takes off from a good length, very sharp bounce, and an equally good leave, could have pushed forward to that and got into trouble
walks down the track and outside the off stump but cannot connect as he tries picking it square on the leg side

thick edge, but there is only one slip and it scoots down to third man, Maqsood is a tall man, and he got on his toes to punch this, but there was so much bounce that it hit the bat high and produced an edge
takes a single behind square leg as another one hits the bat close to the splce
nicely played, he takes an early step to off stump, moves half forward and drives solidly to mid off
he's eyeing the gap past midwicket but cannot beat the man there as he walks outside off stump again
walking outside off and down the pitch consistently, punches into the gap at cover but there is a sweeper in place
moves to off stump and whips a length delivery through square leg
Misbah walks far outside off stump now, but his nudge goes straight to square leg
Misbah slashes hard, and the ball flies in the air behind point
driven to covers
he's played this line across him from around the seventh stump
taps this bouncing delivery to backward point

South Africa are pulling out ripper after ripper, Maqsood's gone after another start, it was banged in short, Maqsood swung around to try and pull it hard, but he's only managed to pop it back in the air, McLaren threw himself to his right to pouch the stunner
what a snorter to get first up, Akmal hopped to try and play the lifter around off stump, he had a weak dab at it, but just inside the line, survives
now he decides to drive hard at this length ball and is beaten
better sense prevails as he takes a step out and shoulders arms to a similar ball
moves forward to have a drive but manages a thick inside edge to pad
tossed up slowly on off stump, blocked off the front foot
drags it shorter, it comes on slowly to middle and leg and is worked to the on side
flat on middle, punched to deep midwicket
goes back to a fuller one and punched to long on
stays low now from a good length, he adjusts to punch it, AB dashes to his right from short cover and stops it
defended to the off side
walks across outside off and plays out this length ball to midwicket
rises from just back of a good length and is left alone
takes a big stride out early and blocks the pitched up delivery
takes off outside off stump as McLaren digs it in, Misbah withdraws bat and watches it zip past
reaches forward to ease a good length ball to the off side
opens the face as he pushes forward and keeps the strike with a single to deep point
Misbah is down on the knee early for the reverse sweep, and beats Amla's dive at short third man
moves forward to drive to long off
full delivery pushed hard to the bowler
lots of flight, the drive beats short extra cover, and goes to wide long off
reaches forward and squeezes this behind point
left alone outside off
another one flagged through outside off
tackles the bounce on this and controls it towards point
opens the face as he comes forward and defends to point
trouble for Misbah, he hops and pushes this in front of cover and takes off, Misbah was out by a couple of metres had Miller hit
defended off the front foot
gets some bounce off a good length, Misbah leaves with the angle across him
walks outside off yet again and nudges a lifting delivery from middle behind square leg
flagged through to the keeper on the angle again
bangs it in short now, Akmal deals with it neatly, dropping the wrists and moving inside the line
bursts forward and thumps a cracking drive straight to extra cover
snorter flies past the batsman as he keeps the bat down safely
opens the face late as he comes forward and picks up a single through point
lunges forward and pushes this length ball down the track
well left, bends his knee to get low and sways inside the line of a rising delivery, also keeps the bat down
now this one is pitched right up to the stumps, Akmal keeps it out without any fuss
a confident stride forward and a solid defensive push to the off side
he's handled this well, he'd already moved across to this short ball, it came on slower than he expected, but he managed to awkwardly send it to fine leg, along the ground
takes a hand off the bat as he lunges forward to defend
this came at around head height close to off stump, but Akmal hopped and steered it deftly to third man
cuts behind point, McLaren at third man slides across and saves the boundary
left alone outside off stump on the angle
good length, going across, left alone
another one climbing high outside off stump, but Akmal brings up a controlled single down to third man
and all of a sudden, he decides to charge out and have a heave, and after handling the short balls so well, is beaten by some margin

and next ball after the heave comes the wicket, he's handled shorter deliveries well today, this climbs somewhat from back of a length, Akmal prods, and South Africa pull off another spectacular catch, de Kock leaping to his right to snap it up one-handed
beaten first ball as Philander moves it in off the seam
and again, he pushes inside the line as this rises from back of a length
pitched up now, he moves forward and defends
tries to sweep hard from around off, it hits the glove and pops up in the air to vacant silly point
defended off the front foot
a boundary now as Misbah sweeps again, takes it on the full with a lunge and sends it behind square leg
hurries on around off stump, is played out off the back foot
googly pushed off the back foot, cover runs in and throws, square leg's dive is in vain, and it races to the boundary
defended off the front foot
moves outside off stump and plays this out to point
weaves inside the line to a lifter and avoids it, did not keep the bat down too much though
well bowled, rises sharply from a good length, Misbah leaves
this moves in after pitching now, but Misbah is ready with one more leave
lunges forward and defends off a thick inside edge to the leg side
big forward stride to keep out this pitched up delivery
moves forward to push a tossed up ball to point
excellent delivery, this was the googly, flighted generously outside off, he went for the drive thinking it was a legbreak, escaped with an inside edge
tossed up even more, pushed into the off side
Misbah tackles with Tahir in his own manner, taking a flighted full ball from off stump and whipping it to long on
Tahir strikes, Bhatti pushes forward to a tossed up delivery, slight turn takes the edge and settles in slip's hands
plays half forward to a pitched up ball, nudges it to the leg side
loud appeal for caught behind turned down, South Africa review, good length delivery bounces, hurries on and brushes the glove as Anwar was looking to avoid it
defended to the off side
back of a length ball pushed to the bowler
tucked off the pad straight to square leg
good length ball left alone outside the off stump
lunges forward and pushes towards cover, was in the air for a while
bat in front of pad to defend back to the bowler
some extra bounce hits the bat high as Misbah strides forward to block
full delivery driven to mid off
another full one, turned through midwicket
nudged with the turn off the pad to fine leg
tossed up full, turned from off stump to deep midwicket
rides the bounce and cuts through point, and also comes back for the second, just in time
more bounce as he digs this short, Misbah thumps a pull wide of fine leg
plays with an angled bat and underedges this length delivery to the lone slip
short of a length on off stump, played out to point
decides to dab late at this widish one and is beaten
straightens from short of a good length and beats him
whips a tossed up ball from middle and off through midwicket
squirts a flighted delivery to mid off
gives it a lot of air and bowls it full outside off, Rehman puts it away to the deep cover boundary
played to the bowler off the front foot
Tahir with a theatrical appeal as Rehman misses the paddle, this was the googly but it pitched outside leg
googly again, better directed, Rehman reaches for it outside off and is beaten
moves forward and defends this pitched up ball to the bowler
that took off from just back of a length, Misbah rode the bounce and managed to keep it down towards point, off the splice
Tsotsobe tries the bouncer now, Misbah misses the hook, the ball bounced too much
pushes forward and squirts it to the lone, wide slip on the bounce
walks outside off stump to counter the angle and plays it out down the pitch
another lifter, Misbah plays from the crease, hops and somehow keeps it down off the glove
this one bounces as well but it slightly wider and is steered down to third man
Misbah escapes, he top edged the sweep, Amla ran hard to his left from short fine leg, but it eluded him
drills a drive wide of the sweeper off an overpitched tossed up ball
played back to the bowler
goes hard at a full toss, it rolls down to long on
cuts a wide one to the right of the sweeper now
lunges forward and pushes to the leg side
opens the face and steers this down to third man
opens the face and runs this length ball to cover
rides the bounce and plays this out to point
Misbah hooks a sharp bouncer from in front of his head, in the air for a while, but well short of fine leg
Tsotsobe's dug in a few very short ones today, this is another one, outside off
tries to dab this straightening short of a length ball and is beaten
exactly what happened off the previous ball, beaten outside off again as he tries to run it to third man
punches this short of a length ball down to third man
runs a back of a length ball to backward point
plays out a good length ball to the off side
turned off the pad but finds short fine leg
dabs a length ball to third man
swings a low full toss down to mid on and keeps the strike
tries to drive a wide ball, but misses
dropped by Duminy at backward point, straightforward chance, decent height as Misbah flashed a cut straight to Duminy, but it pops out of his hands
into the pad, nudged to short fine leg for a quick single
walks outside off stump and runs this to third man
another one steered to third man by Rehman
walks across, hops and plays down this lifter in front of backward point
square drives out to the sweeper to keep strike
hit on the pad with one coming in with the angle, looked high, hit him just above the pad
thought about the hook against this bouncer but ducked in the end
swings hard but mistimes the full delivery to midwicket
Rehman beaten again as he tries to dab a short of a length ball to third man, there was some sort of a sound there, but replays show  gap between bat and ball
short ball angled in, he swivels to try a pull, top edge flies over the keeper
and beaten for the umpteenth time as he opens the face outside off stump
cuts hard, in the air, down to third man
hops and whips a short of a length ball to deep square leg
played back down the pitch to the bowler
tight single, Misbah moved forward and squirted this in front of extra cover, would have probably just made it had there been a direct hit
defends a back of a length ball to the bowler
ducks under a bouncer around off
takes it from middle and works it to deep square leg to bring up one more fighting ODI fifty
whipped from off and middle to square leg for a quick single
hops, opens the face and runs this shortish ball behind point, direct hit would have had Rehman in trouble
another one dropped, it is the substitute fielder who puts this down at third man, Rehman steered it high in the air over the slips, third man ran to his right, got down forward but could not hold on
steered to third man for a single
a low full toss on middle, turned to fine leg
Rehman cuts hard, point takes some pace off it with a dive, third man slides and stops but a better throw from him would have tested Misbah on the second run
flashes outside off and is beaten by the bounce
steered down to third man easily
mid on is up, and Misbah goes deep in the crease to loft a pitched up ball over him, does not time it
moves across but withdraws bat as this slants across him
ducks under a bouncer now
swept to short fine leg for a quick single
punched back to the bowler
full ball swung along the ground to deep midwicket

Amla holds on at deep square leg, and Rehman's fightback is over, stepped down the track and swung it high with the turn, wasn't to the pitch and wasn't on top of the bounce when he connected, Amla manages to take it safely in the end
goes back to a googly and works it to midwicket
pushes a tossed up delivery to the off side
moves forward and defends in front of point for a comfortable single
Tanvir has four second ball, he clips a full delivery in front of square leg, and beats the sprint and big dive from the deep fielder
pushed to covers
shortish ball rises and moves away outside off, left alone
drives in the air but in the gap past extra cover
keeps the strike, working the ball through square leg
punched off the back foot to extra cover
this is angled in full, and Misbah has gone down on a knee quickly to swing it over square leg
makes room outside leg and slogs a full toss to deep midwicket, is cross that Tanvir has't come back for the second
defended off the back foot
driven to extra cover
Misbah is eager to take the single as Tanvir drives a flighted ball to cover, but has to halt midway and turn back, queerly, throw is at the keeper's end
allows the length ball to come on and runs it wide of point
gets off strike with a pushed single in front of cover
punches to sweeper cover
weaves inside the line of a lifter outside off
a rather daft shot to play with your captain depending on you to bat 50 overs, Tanvir drives a length delivery in the air, and mishits it dead straight to the sweeper
hit on the thigh pad as he comes forward to try and defend
Misbah backs away outside leg, Tahir follows him, Misbah jumps outside the line and earns a wide
hurries onto middle stump this one, Misbah keeps it out
charges out, takes a flighted ball on the full and carts it high and straight
and again, this is not on the full, but it is overpitched nonetheless, and Misbah's swung it powerfully over long on
drags it flat and shortish now, Misbah nudges it square on the leg side
a googly, but Ajmal lunges forward and gets an inside edge down the leg side
nudged to fine leg and he'll turn down the single
punches on the up to sweeper cover and tells Ajmal to 'wait, wait, wait'
takes the single now, backs away outside leg but Parnell follows him with a shortish one, Misbah drags it wide of midwicket
Ajmal whips stylishly from around off and dashes out, but square leg is right on the ball
Misbah is stranded, Ajmal prods at the length delivery far away from the body, the ball loops low to wide slip where AB takes it

inn2.comm: de Kock gets off the mark straightaway with a gentle clip to the leg side
Amla too gets off the mark with the first delivery he faces. This was just a gentle push down to long-off, with mid-off chasing it down
Amla stands tall as he cuts this away towards point, with the fielder stopping it well
shortish delivery which tails away as Amla glances this behind square on the leg side
too full on the pads and Tanvir is punished as Amla has all day to work this off his pads to the midwicket boundary. First boundary of the innings with that shot
Amla decides to let this back of a length ball go through to the keeper to finish off the over
back of a length and slanting away as de Kock plays this towards the off side
going down the leg side and de Kock obliges with a neat flick behind square
Amla waits on this length ball outside off before pushing it towards the covers for a couple
Amla solid in defence to this length ball which just comes in
in the slot and Amla gets quickly on the front foot to caress this between cover and mid-off to the boundary
Amla decides to defend this length ball to the off side
stand and deliver from de Kock as he hits through the line, and with minimal footwork, to get this all the way to the extra-cover boundary
back of a length and shaping in as de Kock defends off the back foot
just short of a length outside off as de Kock is solid in defence
de Kock rushes through his shot as he looks to pull a short delivery all the way to the fine leg boundary
de Kock content to defend this short of a length ball back to the bowler
de Kock plays this one back to the bowler to see out the over
Amla gets on his toes to work this away to the leg side
missed opportunity for a boundary there as Amla looks to blitz this through point, but finds the fielder
Amla defends on the back foot to this short of a length ball
Amla once again tries to drive one through extra-cover, but can't find the gap
straying down the pads and Amla flicks this uppishly in the vacant square leg region for a boundary
Amla finally pierces the gap on the off side as he hits this on the up through extra-cover to make it consecutive boundaries
de Kock looks to play this one away to the leg side
de Kock swivels on the back foot to pull this bouncer towards deep square leg
length ball which is guided behind to third man for a single
in the slot but de Kock fails to get this out of the inner ring as he drives this to mid-off
de Kock defends this back of a length ball to the off side
too much width given as de Kock extends his arms to cut this away through the gap to the boundary
starts off with a back of a length delivery which is played with soft hands by Amla to the leg side to get a quick single
going down the pads as de Kock looks to glance this behind to beat short third man, but is unsuccessful
de Kock happy to defend this back of a length delivery to the leg side
too full and on the pads and de Kock times this so sweetly that it comes off the bat like a rocket, beating a 'finish' deep square leg to the boundary
de Kock looking to up the ante as he goes for another pull behind to fine leg, but instead top edges this straight above to short third man, with Ajmal taking the skier
Amla gets on his tippy-toes in an effort to punch this through the covers
Davids solid in defence to the first ball he faces

slightly fuller this time from Tanvir as Davids, looking to glance behind square, misses the ball as it thuds into the pads. Stifled appeal from Tanvir, but that was more of a hopeful shout than anything serious
Davids off the mark with a gentle clip to square leg
excellent delivery as Tanvir gets this to bounce, and with some carry, all the way to the keeper. Davids happy to shoulder arms
Davids opens the face to guide this through point. A funny bounce on the ball evades one of the fielders as they looked to field it, with one of them over-running the ball to his left
short of a length outside off which is punched back to the bowler
back of a length delivery on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler off the back-foot
Amla once again solid in defence
gets this one to shape in slightly as Amla defends with a straight bat
overpitched from Bhatti as Amla leans into the drive, but can't beat short cover to the rope
coming in from back of a length as Amla stands tall in defence
almost yorker length on middle as Amla is able to successfully dig this out
flights this on and around off as Davids gets forward to clip this to the leg side
Amla defends this one away to the leg side
Amla gets on the back foot to try and punch through the off side
going too far down the leg side as Amla is able to glance behind square
flighted again outside off as this seems to almost hold up on Davids as he defends off the back foot
pitches this one outside off, and turns in, as Davids plays the wrong line, with the ball crashing into his front pad. Appeal from the Pakistanis, but turned down
going down the leg side as Amla flicks this away
shortish length outside off as Davids goes for the big swing and a miss as he looks to pull this to the leg side
Davids gets an outside edge to this back of a length ball as it carries behind to third man
drops in another bouncer which is dealt with down to deep square leg
Davids leans forward to try and find the gap on the off side
glances this one down to square leg to retain the strike
Davids unable to find room to work this one away
Davids decides to go for the sweep, but fails to connect
Davids leans forward to defend this one carefully to the leg side, avoiding a threatening short leg
short leg into play once more as Ajmal gets extra bounce, with Davids almost flicking this into short leg's hands
Davids' struggles end prematurely as he once again plays down the wrong line, and then overbalances, with him just short of his crease as Umar Akmal whips off the bails in quick time
Duminy sees out the final ball with an organised front foot defence
length ball outside off which is driven on the up through the covers
back of a length ball shaping in on JP as he defends to the leg side
shifts the line away from the batsman as it is defended back to the bowler
overpitched but JP is unable to find the gap on the off side
shortish delivery as JP quickly gets into position to pull this authoritatively to deep square leg
straying down the pads as Amla obliges with a neat flick behind square
loopy delivery and turning to the leg side as Amla fails to get this away
Amla in control of this one as he defends to the off side
Amla content to defend this one with soft hands to the leg side
Amla gives himself some room to cut this away to the extra-cover region for a boundary. Sweet timing that from Amla
back of a length and going down the pads as Amla looks to work this round the corner past short third man, but can't get it past him
Amla defends this one with soft hands and a straight bat
JP looks to play this one late behind square on the off side, but can't beat the fielder
JP pulls this bouncer from Bhatti with ease through the gap between fine and square leg. Hit it at such a rate of knots that it carried just fine to the boundary after bouncing a couple of times
drops in another short one which JP defends carefully to the leg side
Amla gets on his toes to work this one away on the leg side

gets a leading edge which goes off the face just to the right of Bhatti, who is unable to reach it in his follow through. Played this a fraction too early, which is why it struck the leading edge. Close one there for Pakistan
punches this length ball straight to cover
flighted outside off as JP waits before drilling this down to long-off for a single
tries to work this past short third man, but instead hits it directly to him
Amla waits on the back foot to defend this one with soft hands
this one bounces a bit higher as Amla tries a wristy flick, with the ball going up to the off side
JP gets as forward as possible to defend this on the front foot, even getting an inside-edge onto the pads
Duminy utilises his feet well to create space to manuever this to the midwicket boundary for four
Amla goes after him first ball as he shuffles down and lofts this over the off side, with enough impetus on it to make it to the square boundary
in the slot but Amla drills this straight to silly mid-off. Looked to get this to extra-cover
Amla manufactures a one-knee paddle sweep which travels behind to fine leg for runs
with no foot movement Amla once again looks to cut this away late to the off side. Ball zooms past the outside edge
gets this one even closer as Rehman bowls just outside off, and turns away at the last moment as Amla executes his stroke

Amla, looking to create space to work this on the off side, hits it too sweetly to point, and inadvertently runs down the track. However, when he sees backward point come in quickly to throw to the keeper, he turns around and struggles to make it back to his crease, with the bat well short
the first ball after the break is defended to the leg side
JP gets forward to defend
once again looking to find room, but plays this back to the bowler
once again looking to create space on the leg side, but fails to get this away as it bounces higher than expected
JP able to cover the line and drive this down to long-on to get off the strike
back of a length and flighted as AB plays this with soft hands to the off side
this one holds up on AB as he gets an outside edge which pops up behind square on the off side
steps down the track to defend this one back to the bowler
AB uses his feet well to drive this through mid-off, with a diving mid-off stopping most of it, with the ball petering behind
AB waits on the back foot to try and guide this through the off side
once again AB fails to pierce the gap on the off side
marginally short and outside off, de Villiers cuts it late to the man at short third man
tosses this one up towards the pads as JP helps it along to the leg side
flighted on middle as JP gets forward to defend
JP waits on it before trying to drive past mid-on
in the slot as JP caresses this one down to mid-off
back of a length as AB rocks back to pull this away to the leg side
JP tries in vain to find the gap on the leg side to end Maqsood's first over
this one turns away outside off as AB cuts this away

and Rehman strikes as he flights this one outside off, with the ball hitting the bat then front pad to spoon behind to the keeper, who runs in to the leg side for a rather easy catch. The fielders and keeper goes up, and the umpire confirms the decision soon after
Miller moves himself to cover the line outside off
AB defends this one manfully to the leg side
AB drives this one down to long-off for an easy single
once again Miller defends this on the front foot, with the ball inside-edging and going behind to fine leg
Miller drives this one straight down to long-on, who runs in to stop the ball before the straight boundary
Miller able to play this one with soft hands to the off side for one
AB plays this one under his eyes to the off side for a quick single
too full from Maqsood as he drills this one straight to sweeper cover
AB creates space to flay this one to the off side to get another single
Miller waits patiently on the back foot to punch this towards sweeper cover
Miller advances down the track to this flighted ball, but hits it straight to silly mid-off
Miller looking to be positive as he looks to work this one round the corner
Miller hits this one uppishly to silly mid-off, who dives valiantly to the left, but the ball just bounces short of him
AB able to work this one down to long-off for a single
Miller dances down the track to loft Rehman through extra-cover for what turns out to be a safe shot with no fielders out there
finishes off the over with a display of his front foot defence
flighted outside off and turning in as AB looks to beat Ajmal to the right of him, but Ajmal runs after to stop the ball from straying too far away
AB gently pushes this one down to long-on
Miller gets on the back foot to cut this away to the off side for one
AB, with the weight on his back foot, cuts this one away with the most minimal of footwork
excellent delivery from Ajmal as he gets this to turn away from Miller, who is playing with a straight bat, with the ball just beating the edge on its way to the keeper
gets this one on the pads as Miller is able to run the leg-bye
back of a length and Miller looks to force this through the leg side
gets high on him as he glances this off the pads behind square on the leg side
AB content to play this one back to the bowler
AB backs away to filet this through extra-cover for a single
gets this one to bounce a bit higher as it beats the cut from Miller to the keeper
Miller advances down the track to try and tuck this away to the leg side
AB able to play this off his pads to the leg side
drifts this one on middle as Miller plays this one to the off side
even width provided from Ajmal as Miller pierces the gap through point with a back foot cut
fantastic reply from Ajmal as this one just turns away, with the ball beating the edge
Miller leans forward to defend this one to the leg side
Miller happy to see out the over with another gentle dab to the leg side
AB covers the line effectively as this one is played to the leg side
AB backs away but plays a drive towards the fielder on the off side
AB looking to manufacture a shot through the leg side, but hits this one off the back foot
waits patiently on this one as he punches with ease through the covers
little wide from the bowler as Miller is able to guide this behind to third man. They run quick enough between the wickets to get three
AB looking to back way before improvising a paddle to the leg side behind square
length ball outside off which is defended back to the bowler
no-ball called from the umpire as AB defends this one back to the bowler. The next ball will be a free hit

free hit, going round the wicket to AB as he fires in a bouncer which AB, looking to hit this over fine leg, instead hits his helmet, and then goes on to the back of his bat, with the ball finally carrying past third man. Strange sequence of events there
straying down the pads as AB helps this along behind square
Miller flashes hard at this one when Tanvir offers width, and despite a spread-eagled dive from first slip, this one travels all the way to the third man boundary

and Tanvir gets his man as Miller, looking for another hard edge outside off, ends up getting caught behind by the keeper, who takes a fine diving catch. We are now officially into South Africa's tail
back of a length and defended back to Tanvir to see out what has been a successful over for Pakistan
flighted outside off as AB drives this one down to long-off
flighted on middle as this one is defended carefully to the leg side
gets on the back foot to try and find space on the leg side
what a way to get off the mark as McLaren leans into a drive through extra-cover which goes all the way to the boundary
little width again as McLaren is able to squirt this behind to third man for a couple
defended off the back foot by McLaren

goes round the wicket as AB, looking to glance this behind square as he steps into the line of the delivery which is slanting away, beats his bat and almost the keeper behind him. Went a long way across there
length ball outside off which is pushed to point
short of a length outside off which rises upon pitching as McLaren goes for the cut
McLaren looks to ease this one past mid-on, but can't beat the fielder
slower ball outside off which is defended by McLaren manfully
in the slot as AB eases into a drive which is intercepted by deep extra-cover
AB content to defend this one to the leg side
AB goes for the drive down to mid-off to get off strike
back of a length as McLaren defends this one off the back foot
once again cramping him for space as he just gets this one away to the leg side for a single
AB just helps this one round the corner to fine leg to complete two runs
once again in the slot and AB is able to hit this hard enough for a diving silly mid-off to bobble the ball, which allows for the extra run
AB stands tall in defence as he plays this one to the off side
Tanvir gets this one wrong completely as he bowls a high beamer that goes over AB's head. This one seemed to slip out as he quickly acknowledges the mistake
AB looking to be cute as he plays this rising delivery, with the intent of getting this one behind to third man
AB leans forward to defend with a straight bat
bowls a length ball which shapes in as AB is content to defend once more
little width on offer as AB pushes this towards the covers
AB able to work this one to deep midwicket to retain strike for the next over
flights this one just outside off as it turns away, beating McLaren's edge
gets into position for the sweep shot a bit too early as the ball misses the blade and gets an odd bounce behind which hits off the keeper's thigh onto first slip's thigh, who looks in a bit of pain
McLaren able to tuck this one to square leg to get off strike
AB waits on the back foot to work this one away down to mid-on
McLaren given enough room outside off to cut this away to point
McLaren plays this one with an angled bat to the off side
shortish length outside off as AB finally gets his first boundary with a back foot punch that beats point and fine leg to the boundary
AB follows that up with a push to the left of Bhatti, but can't sneak the run
once again AB tries to push a length ball down the ground, but finds the fielder
nicely timed shot from AB as he pulls this one to the midwicket boundary
short ball which is defended back to the bowler
another snorter from Bhatti as AB plays this one close to his body
McLaren able to find the gap first ball as he caresses this through the covers. Pressure on Ajmal straightaway
plays this one with an angled bat with a view to getting this behind past short third man
McLaren hits this one back into the ground, which is hit back to the bowler
this one comes in with the angle from round the wicket, McLaren comes slightly forward and pushes it to cover
flatter delivery on the stumps, McLaren goes on the back foot and turns it to short leg
McLaren able to work this one square off the wicket for a single
McLaren punches this one off the back foot behind square on the off side
AB able to open the face to run this one down to third man
gets this one full on the pads, with the bowler going for the appeal, but this was always outside the line
McLaren eases this length ball to the leg side for a single
AB able to glance this one with consummate ease to deep midwicket
tests him with a shorter one as this one rises over his head to the keeper. Called one for the over
drifts this one in as AB defends off the front foot
AB tries to tuck this one away to the leg side
AB de Villiers crunches this fuller one through extra-cover to bring up his second boundary this innings. Looking to press the accelerator now as only 17 are required
follows that up with a gentle flick to the leg side for one

and Ajmal penetrates McLaren's defence with the doosra as McLaren, looking to cover the line for the ball turning away, is instead greeted with one that hits the handle of the bat, and inside-edges onto the stumps. A solid effort from McLaren as South Africa whittle down the target
Parnell sees off the final ball as Ajmal finishes a testing spell
AB whips this shortish delivery off the pads
going down the pads as Parnell looks to get this behind, with the ball hitting his pads and rolling to the right of the keeper. AB and Parnell run a hesitant bye
AB looking to stand and deliver as he lasers this through the off side, but hits it straight to silly mid-off
going down the leg side and AB obliges by helping this round the corner with a sweet-timed pull
AB waits on the back foot to flat bat this behind square, and when short third man makes a fumble, is able to take the run
full toss from Bhatti as Parnell fails to drive this down the ground, finding mid-on instead
length ball on middle which is defended back to the bowler
AB de Villiers punches this one off the back foot to find long-off
Parnell, on the back foot, pushes this just to the right of the bowler
Parnell succeeds in finding the gap at mid-on to get a single
AB caresses this one down to sweeper cover for an easy single
Parnell creates space to push this one down to mid-off to retain strike for the next over
length ball on the pads as Parnell fails to get this away
squared up by this one as Parnell hangs his bat to get a thick outside edge down to third man
AB able to bunt this one down to mid-on for a quick-ran single
Parnell able to seal the match in style with a cover drive that leaves the Pakistan fielders in their tracks as this limbers over the extra-cover rope
